doc:
Leslie Perrins https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leslie_Perrins 0 Leslie Perrins (7 October 1901 – 13 December 1962) was an English actor who often played villains. After training at RADA, he was on stage from 1922, and in his long career, appeared in well over 60 films. Leslie_Perrins ( 7_October_1901 – 13_December_1962 ) was an_English_actor who often played villains . After training at RADA , he was on stage from 1922 , and in his_long_career , appeared_in well over 60_films .
